name: Froggy Rope
description:
First of all, the font i'm using was took from Daniel Linssen (https://managore.itch.io/m3x6), go check out his games, they're great!

Welp, this is what i could do in a week, but the soil of the game is ready. Definitely going to make updates, there were a couple of ideas i couldn't realize in time (better BG, music, gameplay features like change of pace and etc.), but i'm happy the jam made me continue development of this game. If you are interested, don't forget to follow!
